function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of standardization in laboratory protocols for detecting sars-cov-2 and determining viral content","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation of clinical technology to wbe","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Small market size for environmental biosensors","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of optimization in wastewater treatment technology for virus transmission control","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of pcr technologies and endogenous biomarker measurements may lead to inaccurate identification of specific diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate identification of specific diseases due to biomarkers not being specific to a given disease, leading to misdiagnosis and ineffective containment measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of asymptomatic cases and immunized patients through wbe may lead to complacency and reduced adherence to preventive measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of microfluidic cartridges and pcr-based systems for rapid testing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Approval and widespread use of various poct systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Application of technology without professional skills","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global environmental changes such as climate change and ecosystem shifts altering the thresholds of the planet","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the complex ways in which global changes affect human, animal, and natural systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continued high incidence and distribution of vectorborne diseases vbds","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vector-borne diseases and zoonotic diseases are implicated, disproportionately impacting people in tropical climates with inadequate access to health services, poor housing, weak governance structures, and socio-economic underdevelopment.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of progress in tackling vector-borne diseases vbds across the world and across all diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emerging vector-borne diseases, such as zika virus zikv and chikungunya chik , have infected millions and are linked to neurological and developmental disorders in infants.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Over-emphasis on technology and biomedical expertise","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underdeveloped thematic areas for vbds: community participation, citizen engagement, social differentiation, and wider system dynamics","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for vulnerability, resilience, adaption, and community-based approaches","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased vector densities and geographical spread due to climate change","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding the impacts of global change on vector-borne diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate community-based approaches for vector-borne disease strategies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wide variation in level of detail provided in adaptation plans","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of attention to education and community participation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to specify responsible agencies and mechanisms for collaboration and funding","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vector-borne diseases transmitted by multiple species of vectors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of climate change on vector populations","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ecosystem disturbances and biodiversity loss","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased contact between biting insect vectors, animal hosts, and humans due to deforestation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in vegetation and land cultivation dynamics due to deforestation shifting vector-animal relations","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced biodiversity and range of reservoir hosts impacting trypanosomiasis infection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate access to improved sanitation and drinking water","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impacts of water developments on ecosystems and spread of vector-borne diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in agricultural practices leading to increased larval densities of disease-carrying mosquitoes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Water shortages leading to increased contact with snail-infested waters and more breeding sites for disease-carrying mosquitoes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unplanned urbanization leading to proliferation of slums and inadequate sanitation, leading to increased vector-borne disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased house infestations of triatomine bugs due to simple improvements in public streetlights","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Electric pumps as a risk factor for schistosomiasis spread in brazil","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proliferation of aedes aegypti and aedes albopictus in urban areas leading to spread of dengue fever, zika, and chikungunya","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of chagas disease in urban areas influenced by housing quality and land tenure security","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Migration of people, goods, and vehicles across borders and seas translocates vectors and pathogens to new areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Natural disasters and armed conflicts disrupt existing medical services and contribute to landscape changes, leading to increased vulnerability to disease outbreaks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Movement between low-and high-risk areas contributes to the spread of drug-resistant and emerging infectious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Biological change and drug resistance","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social and political change","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on foreign aid and outside experts","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex dynamics and interconnectivities of global changes","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inevitability of increased vulnerability, infection, and epidemics due to global change","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglecting local community adaptations in epidemic contexts","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid change in technology for ecosystem surveillance","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"}]}
